item.title: njs-0.8.7 bugfix version has been released.
nginx-1.27.2 mainline version has been released.
item.description:
2024-10-02

nginx-1.27.2 mainline version has been released.

item.title: njs-0.8.6 version has been released, featuring the QuickJS engine support.
item.description:
2024-10-02

njs-0.8.6 version has been released, featuring the QuickJS engine support.

item.title: The nginx project has officially moved to GitHub. Use GitHub issues instead of trac.nginx.org, GitHub discussions instead of nginx mailing list.
item.description:
2024-09-06

The nginx project has officially moved to GitHub. Use GitHub issues instead of trac.nginx.org, GitHub discussions instead of nginx mailing list.

item.title: nginx-1.26.2 stable and nginx-1.27.1 mainline versions have been released, with a fix for the buffer overread vulnerability in the ngx_http_mp4_module (CVE-2024-7347).
item.description:
2024-08-14

nginx-1.26.2 stable and nginx-1.27.1 mainline versions have been released, with a fix for the buffer overread vulnerability in the ngx_http_mp4_module (CVE-2024-7347).

item.title: The njs project has officially moved to GitHub. Read more.
item.description:
2024-06-05

The njs project has officially moved to GitHub. Read more.

item.title: nginx-1.26.1 stable and nginx-1.27.0 mainline versions have been released, with fixes for vulnerabilities in HTTP/3 (CVE-2024-32760, CVE-2024-31079, CVE-2024-35200, CVE-2024-34161).
item.description:
2024-05-29

nginx-1.26.1 stable and nginx-1.27.0 mainline versions have been released, with fixes for vulnerabilities in HTTP/3 (CVE-2024-32760, CVE-2024-31079, CVE-2024-35200, CVE-2024-34161).

item.title: The nginx.org website project has officially moved to GitHub.
item.description:
2024-05-13

The nginx.org website project has officially moved to GitHub.

item.title:
nginx-1.26.0 stable version has been released, incorporating new features and bug fixes from the 1.25.x mainline branch — including experimental HTTP/3 support, HTTP/2 on a
per-server basis, virtual servers in the stream module, passing stream connections to listen sockets, and more.
item.description:
2024-04-23

nginx-1.26.0 stable version has been released, incorporating new features and bug fixes from the 1.25.x mainline branch  — including experimental HTTP/3 support, HTTP/2 on a per-server basis, virtual servers in the stream module, passing stream connections to listen sockets, and more.
